searchEngines:
# Vimium custom search engines

## Amazon
a: https://www.amazon.de/s?k=%s Amazon

## Apple Documentation
app: https://developer.apple.com/search/?q=%s&type=Documentation Apple Documentation

## DeepL
dlen: https://www.deepl.com/de/translator#en/es/%s DeepL eng->spa
dles: https://www.deepl.com/de/translator#es/en/%s DeepL spa->eng

## DuckDuckGo
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo

## GitHub
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub

## Google.
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gi: https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s Google Images
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps

## IMDB
imdb: https://www.imdb.com/find?s=all&q=%s IMDB

## SENEC Jira
sj: https://senec-ies.atlassian.net/browse/SENAPP-%s SENEC Jira

## StackOverflow
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s StackOverflow

## Wikipedia.
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

## Youtube
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
